Package contractgen

Interface Program

All Known Implementing Classes:
RISCVProgram, SimpleProgram
public interface Program
The program interface.

  • Method Details

    • printSymbolic

      String printSymbolic()
      Prints symbolic variables for the bounded model check in Verilog syntax.
      Returns:
      All symbolic variables in Verilog sytax.

    • printProgram

      String printProgram(Integer address)
      Prints the program in Verilog syntax.
      Parameters:
      address - The offset at which the first instruction should be located in memory.
      Returns:
      The program in Verilog syntax.

    • maxAddress

      int maxAddress(int base)
      Computes the highest address of the included instructions.
      Parameters:
      base - The offset at which the first instruction should be located in memory.
      Returns:
      The highest address.

    • printInit

      void printInit(String path)
      Writes the instructions to instantiate the initial architectural state in a file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to be used to store the file.

    • printInstr

      void printInstr(String path)
      Writes the instructions of the program in a file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to be used to store the file.
